channel.title: Feudal pkz || pking || spawn || curses || torva || pk server!
channel.description:
[center]releasing my pk server i made awhile ago!
[u]Features[/u]
::item Restrictions - boss that drops all boss items - spec altar - home in wild - half of home is multi half pk - pk shops - kdr command - PKP BUGS FIXED! - MOST DUPED FIXED![/center]
Here are Pics.
[center][IMG]http://i1122.photobucket.com/albums/l537/Streams2lakes/24.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i1122.photobucket.com/albums/l537/Streams2lakes/Untitled.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i1122.photobucket.com/albums/l537/Streams2lakes/2.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i1122.photobucket.com/albums/l537/Streams2lakes/6.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i1122.photobucket.com/albums/l537/Streams2lakes/5.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i1122.photobucket.com/albums/l537/Streams2lakes/4.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i1122.photobucket.com/albums/l537/Streams2lakes/3.jpg[/img][/center]
SOURCE DOWNLOAD!
[url=http://uppit.com/s24opedjnen1/FPKZ_FINAL!_(_SOURCE).rar]http://uppit.com/s24opedjnen1/FPKZ_FINAL!_(_SOURCE).rar[/url]
CLIENT!
any hybrid pvp 3 + client will work, im too lazy to put client link cuz i gota upload it.
credz
me
hybrid pvp

item.title: Feudal pkz || pking || spawn || curses || torva || pk server!
item.dc:creator: @Eddie_Crosswall Eddie Crosswall
item.description:
@Eddie_Crosswall wrote:

You should had continued building on it. A server doesn’t come popular all at once. It takes dedicated time and work. This is fairly unique with a safe home in the wild ( I may have seen one other server like this? ) so yeah it could had got somewhere possibly…(on the other hand it looks like hybrid client o_0)
